quote: A wizard is never late, Frodo Baggins. Nor is he early. He arrives precisely when he means to.
author: Gandalf

quote: He that breaks a thing to find out what it is, has left the path of wisdom.
author: Gandalf

quote: When in doubt, follow your nose.
author: Gandalf

quote: Death is just another path, one that we all must take.
author: Gandalf

quote: You shall not pass!
author: Gandalf

quote: One ring to rule them all. One ring to find them. One ring to bring them all and in the darkness bind them!
author: Gandalf

quote: The burned hand teaches best. After that, advice about fire goes to the heart.
author: Gandalf

quote: All you have to decide is what to do with the time that is given to you.
author: Gandalf

quote: Who knows? Have patience. Go where you must go, and hope!
author: Gandalf

quote: Despair is only for those who see the end beyond all doubt. We do not.
author: Gandalf

quote: No, thank you! We don’t want any more visitors, well-wishers, or distant relations!
author: Bilbo Baggins

quote: I don’t know half of you half as well as I should like, and I like less than half of you half as well as you deserve.
author: Bilbo Baggins

quote: Not all those who wander are lost.
author: Bilbo Baggins

quote: I thought up an ending for my book: ‘And he lived happily ever after, unto the end of his days.
author: Bilbo Baggins

quote: Gandalf, my old friend, this will be a night to remember.
author: Bilbo Baggins

quote: It is useless to meet revenge with revenge. It will heal nothing.
author: Frodo Baggins

quote: I don’t know, and I would rather not guess.
author: Frondo Baggins

quote: It’s the job that’s never started as takes longest to finish.
author: Samwise Gamgee

quote: There’s some good in this world, Mr. Frodo… and it’s worth fighting for.
author: Samwise Gamgee

quote: I’m coming, Mr. Frodo.
author: Samwise Gamgee

quote: Potatoes. Boil ’em, mash ’em, stick ’em in a stew.
author: Samwise Gamgee

quote: I can’t carry it for you, but I can carry you.
author: Samwise Gamgee

quote: Do you remember the taste of strawberries?
author: Samwise Gamgee

quote: I made a promise, Mr. Frodo. A promise. ‘Don’t you leave him, Samwise Gamgee.’ And I don’t mean to. I don’t mean to.
author: Samwise Gamgee

quote: Books ought to have good endings. How would this do? ‘And they all settled down and lived together happily ever after.
author: Samwise Gamgee

quote: Snow’s all right on a fine morning, but I like to be in bed when it’s falling.
author: Samwise Gamgee

quote: Faithless is he that says farewell when the road darkens.
author: Gimli

quote: Nobody tosses a Dwarf!
author: Gimli

quote: One does not simply walk into Mordor.
author: Boromir

quote: Lembas! Elvish waybread. One small bite is enough to fill the stomach of a grown man.
author: Legolas

quote: Gentlemen, we do not stop till nightfall.
author: Aragorn

quote: I would have gone with you to the end, into the very fires of Mordor.
author: Aragorn

quote: A hunted man sometimes wearies of distrust and longs for friendship.
author: Aragorn

quote: It is but a shadow and a thought that you love. I cannot give you what you seek.
author: Aragorn

quote: Even the smallest person can change the course of the future.
author: Queen Galadriel

quote: It came to me. It’s mine, my own, my love, my precious.
author: Gollum

quote: And to that, I hold. I would rather share one lifetime with you than face all the ages of this world alone.
author: Arwen Undómiel

quote: It is a strange fate that we should suffer so much fear and doubt over so small a thing, such a little thing.
author: Boromir

quote: You step into the Road, and if you don’t keep your feet, there is no knowing where you might be swept off to.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: Let him not vow to walk in the dark, who has not seen the nightfall.
author: Elrond

quote: Home is behind, the world ahead, and there are many paths to tread through shadows to the edge of night, until the stars are all alight.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: Your time will come. You will face the same Evil, and you will defeat it.
author: Arwen Undómiel

quote: If more of us valued food and cheer and song above hoarded gold, it would be a merrier world.
author: Thorin Oakenshield

quote: This day does not belong to one man but to all. Let us together rebuild this world that we may share in the days of peace.
author: Aragorn

quote: All that is gold does not glitter, not all those who wander are lost.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: Deep roots are not reached by the frost.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us.
author: Gandalf

quote: Never laugh at live dragons.
author: Bilbo Baggins

quote: Courage is found in unlikely places.
author: Gildor Inglorion

quote: In a hole in the ground there lived a hobbit.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: Do not meddle in the affairs of wizards, for they are subtle and quick to anger.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: Hello fellow travelers. I am the cat. Nice to meet you!
author: Mx

quote: To be or not to be, conticent road tristichs slaughteries.
author: Library of Babel

quote: I just wanted to be one of The Strokes - Now look at the mess you made me make.
author: Alex Turner

quote: The horizon tries but it's just not as kind on the eyes as Arabella.
author: Alex Turner

quote: All that’s left is the truth that love’s not only blind but deaf.
author: Alex Turner

quote: So have you got the guts? Been wondering if your heart's still open and if so I wanna know what time it shuts.
author: Alex Turner

quote: The middle of adventure, such a perfect place to start.
author: Alex Turner

quote: But I crumble completely when you cry.
author: Alex Turner

quote: But I crumble completely when you cry. It seems like once again you've had to greet me with goodbye.
author: Alex Turner

quote: What came first, the chicken or the dickhead?
author: Alex Turner

quote: Who wants to sleep in the city that never wakes up?
author: Alex Turner

quote: Dorothy was right though.
author: Alex Turner

quote: Well, I bet that you look good on the dance-floor.
author: Alex Turner

quote: Give me an eeny, meeny, miny, moe or an ip, dip, dog shit rock and roll
author: Alex Turner

quote: There's this tune I found that makes me think of you somehow and I play it on repeat
author: Alex Turner

quote: Afraid of what the truth might bring he locks his doors and never leaves
author: Matt Shultz

quote: I don't have the strength to play nice.
author: Matt Shultz

quote: There's only one girl in this world for you and she probably lives in Tahiti.
author: Matt Shultz

quote: From the moment I first saw you, I was yours and you were mine.
author: Matt Shultz

quote: Deep down we both knew you were trouble by design.
author: Matt Shultz

quote: No turning back, nowhere to run, nowhere to hide. It's too late to say goodbye.
author: Matt Shultz

quote: Just the two of us forever, no one else around.
author: Matt Shultz

quote: Forced to watch the ashes floating, softly drifting to the ground.
author: Matt Shultz

quote: You know that I would save you if I could.
author: Matt Shultz

quote: I pushed and I pulled 'til I pushed you aside.
author: Matt Shultz

quote: You are one of God's mistakes. You crying, tragic waste of skin.
author: Brian Molko

quote: Because a heart that hurts is a heart that works.
author: Brian Molko

quote: Can you imagine a love that is so proud? It never has to question why or how.
author: Brian Molko

quote: Sucker love is heaven sent.
author: Brian Molko

quote: Can you find me space inside your bleeding heart?
author: Brian Molko

quote: We need to concentrate on more than meets the eye.
author: Brian Molko

quote: You are a leap of faith I could not take, a promise I could not make.
author: Brian Molko

quote: Hold your breath and count to 10. Then fall apart and start again.
author: Brian Molko

quote: Stupid me to believe that I could trust in stupid you.
author: Brian Molko

quote: Thought I was getting carat gold but what I got was you
author: Brian Molko

quote: All it takes is one decision A lot of guts, a little vision.
author: Brian Molko

quote: The past will catch you up as you run faster.
author: Brian Molko

quote: Do a lot of people not know if they’re robots?
author: Loki of Asgard

quote: This has been a very enjoyable pantomime, but I’d like to go home now.
author: Loki of Asgard

quote: No one bad is ever truly bad, and no one good is ever truly good.
author: Loki of Asgard

quote: You're mistaking me for someone in control.
author: Warhaus

quote: People think I'm a miserable sod but it's only because I get asked such bloody miserable questions.
author: Nick Cave

quote: Stars have their moments then they die.
author: Nick Cave

quote: Art should always be an exchange.
author: Nick Cave

quote: Your limitations make you the wonderful disaster you most probably are.
author: Nick Cave

quote: Some people say that it's just rock and roll ah, but it gets you right down to your soul
author: Nick Cave

quote: And anyway I told the truth but I'm afraid I told a lie
author: Nick Cave

quote: I solemnly swear I am up to no good.
author: Harry Potter

quote: You're a little scary sometimes, you know that? Brilliant... but scary.
author: Ron Weasley

quote: Happiness can be found, even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
author: Albus Dumbledore

quote: I want to commit the murder I was imprisoned for.
author: Sirius Black
